New Records: Finn Allen scored 137 runs from 62 balls
Key Match Events: Finn Allen's 137-run onslaught helped New Zealand seal a 45-run win against Pakistan
Tim Southee led the Kiwi bowling attack after he scalped two wickets in his four-over spell
Babar Azam was the only standout batter for the 'Men in Green' with 58 runs from 37 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Finn Allen was named the 'Player of the Match' after his blitz knock in the first inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand clinched the series win over Pakistan with this match
The Kiwis gained an unassailable lead over Pakistan after the end of the third T20I game
Others: The match was played at University Oval in Dunedin on January 17, 2024
